<title><![CDATA[Can we ever kick our smartphone addiction? Jim Balsillie and Norman Doidge discuss]]></title>

<item>
<title><![CDATA[Data protection officers becoming sought-after commodities in tech industry]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/technology/data-protection-officers-becoming-sought-after-commodities-in-tech-industry/article37984780/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[More than 28,000 DPOs will be needed in Europe and U.S. and as many as 75,000 around the globe as a result of the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation, which goes into effect in May]]></description>
<pubDate>Wed, 14 Feb 2018 19:16:45 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">37984780</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Salvador Rodriguez]]></dc:creator>

<item>
<title><![CDATA[Google launching ad filter in Chrome to raise bar on browsing experience]]></title>

<description><![CDATA[Candidates for blocking include pop-up ads, those that cover more than a third of a smartphone screen and video ads that play automatically with sound]]></description>

<guid isPermaLink="false">37984641</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[SUSAN KRASHINSKY ROBERTSON]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[AI’s disruptive reputation belies its potential for positive change]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/report-on-business/rob-commentary/ais-disruptive-reputation-belies-its-potential-for-positive-change/article37983300/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Sometime in the future, when driverless cars are commonplace, there will be no need for taxi and bus drivers – but until then, the opportunity and the challenge for companies will be to identify where artificial intelligence can solve the real problems of today that offer a competitive advantage]]></description>
<pubDate>Wed, 14 Feb 2018 16:36:00 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">37983300</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[KHALID AL-KOFAHI]]></dc:creator>
</item>
